article.title: Boeing Receives Global Positioning System IIF Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company of Seal Beach, California, was awarded a $12 million contract modification, a Global Positioning System (GPS) IIF Space Vehicle calendar year 2011 option exercise.Â U.S. Air Force Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, California, is the contracting activity.
